sentences: Ta soovis rohelist ja valget kohvi, ilma magususest arusaamata.
Tema juuksed olid kihistunud valget ja need vajasid pühkida.
Ma näha teda valget jaloga, aga ei saanud midagi teha.
context: Valget is the partitive form of 'valge', meaning white in Estonian. It's used after verbs like need (to want), see (to see), and other prepositions that require partitive cases.
